name: health-progress-tracker
description: A web application to track health progress with weight and waist measurements

scripts.docker:build: node -e "console.log('Building Docker image...'); process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('scripts\\docker-build.bat', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('chmod +x scripts/docker-build.sh && scripts/docker-build.sh', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.docker:build:test: node -e "console.log('Building and testing Docker image...'); process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('scripts\\docker-build.bat --test', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('chmod +x scripts/docker-build.sh && scripts/docker-build.sh --test', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.docker:publish: node -e "console.log('Publishing Docker image...'); process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('scripts\\docker-publish.bat', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('chmod +x scripts/docker-publish.sh && scripts/docker-publish.sh', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
